query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ai_vision_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  user_id VARCHAR(100),
  image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
  image_key VARCHAR(255),
  image_name VARCHAR(255),
  image_size INT,
  image_mime_type VARCHAR(100),
  status ENUM('pass', 'fail', 'warning') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pass',
  confidence DECIMAL(5,4) DEFAULT 0,
  quality_score INT DEFAULT 0,
  defect_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  defects JSON,
  summary TEXT,
  recommendations JSON,
  processing_time_ms INT DEFAULT 0,
  product_type VARCHAR(100),
  inspection_standard VARCHAR(100),
  machine_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  production_line_id INT,
  workstation_id INT,
  batch_id VARCHAR(100),
  serial_number VARCHAR(100),
  operator_id VARCHAR(100),
  shift_id INT,
  raw_llm_response TEXT,
  analyzed_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_status (status),
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_analyzed_at (analyzed_at),
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_machine_id (machine_id),
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_product_id (product_id)
);

  defects JSON,
  summary TEXT,
  recommendations JSON,
  processing_time_ms INT DEFAULT 0,
  product_type VARCHAR(100),
  inspection_standard VARCHAR(100),
  machine_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  production_line_id INT,
  workstation_id INT,
  batch_id VARCHAR(100),
  serial_number VARCHAR(100),
  operator_id VARCHAR(100),
  shift_id INT,
  raw_llm_response TEXT,
  analyzed_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_status (status),
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_analyzed_at (analyzed_at),
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_machine_id (machine_id),
  INDEX idx_ai_vision_product_id (product_id)
);
